name: emblematically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that represents a particular person, group, or idea: The beat makes the song emblematically Latin American. The restaurant serves emblematically French dishes. See
emblematic
More examplesFewer examplesRio de Janeiro's carnival is arguably the most emblematically Brazilian cultural event of the year.The photos were emblematically domestic.Maps figure emblematically throughout the film.
